org.mym.plog.config

Class PLogConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mym.plog.config.PLogConfig

  • public class PLogConfig
extends Object
    Configuration class for the whole library.

    You can't call constructor directly; instead we recommend you to use Builder. All options are documented in that class.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    PLogConfig.Builder

    • Method Detail

      • checkConfigSafe

        public static void checkConfigSafe(PLogConfig config)
                            throws RuntimeException
        Check whether a config is valid or not. This is useful when our library importing new config items, and can prevent user's wrong usage.

        If all condition check pass, then this method do nothing; otherwise it would throw a Runtime Exception.

        Parameters:
        config - config object to detect
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - maybe any subclass of RuntimeException if any assertion failed.

      • newBuilder
